com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt.gateway
Class AmtMulticastEndpoint

java.lang.Object
  com.larkwoodlabs.net.amt.gateway.AmtMulticastEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageInput<UdpDatagram>, MulticastEndpoint
public final class AmtMulticastEndpoint
extends Object
implements MulticastEndpoint

A MulticastEndpoint that uses AMT to request and receive multicast datagrams sent to a specific multicast group address and UDP port number. The endpoint provides "push" and "pull" methods for datagram delivery. If an OutputChannel is attached to the endpoint, incoming datagrams are pushed into the output channel as they arrive. If no output channel is provided, the incoming datagrams are queued internally and retrieved by calling the receive(int) method.

A single multicast endpoint may be used to join both IPv4 and IPv6 multicast groups irrespective of the relay discovery address used.

Author:
Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

Constructor Detail

AmtMulticastEndpoint

public AmtMulticastEndpoint(int port,
                            int bufferCapacity)
Constructs an instance bound that buffers incoming UDP datagrams in an internal queue that can be read using the receive(int) method.

Parameters:
port - The endpoint will forward datagrams sent to this port number. Additional port numbers may be included by calling an appropriate join method, e.g. join(InetAddress, int).
bufferCapacity - The desired internal queue size.

AmtMulticastEndpoint

public AmtMulticastEndpoint(int port,
                            OutputChannel<UdpDatagram> pushChannel)
Parameters:
port - The endpoint will receive datagrams sent to this port number. Additional port numbers may be included by calling an appropriate join method, e.g. join(InetAddress, int).
pushChannel - The endpoint will send incoming datagrams to this channel.

AmtMulticastEndpoint

                            InetAddress relayDiscoveryAddress,

port - The endpoint will forward datagrams sent to this port number. Additional port numbers may be included by calling an appropriate join method, e.g. join(InetAddress, int).
relayDiscoveryAddress - The address (anycast or unicast) that the endpoint will use to locate an AMT relay that can be used to join specific multicast group(s).
bufferCapacity -

receive

public final UdpDatagram receive(int milliseconds)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedIOException,
                                 InterruptedException
Description copied from interface: MessageInput
Attempts to retrieve a message from a message source and if necessary, waits the specified amount of time until a message becomes available.

Some implementations may choose to return the static Object MessageInput.EOM to indicate that the source has stopped producing messages.

Specified by:
receive in interface MessageInput<UdpDatagram>
Parameters:
milliseconds - The amount of time allotted to complete the operation.
Returns:
A MessageType object or the object MessageInput.EOM.
Throws:
IOException - The receive operation has failed.
InterruptedIOException - The receive operation was interrupted or timed out.
InterruptedException - The calling thread was interrupted before the receive operation could complete.
